title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 601.3 - Name of the college
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 601.3 - Name of the college

State Regulations

Any college hereafter established which is by definition a
community college shall incorporate in its name (a) the words "community
college" and (b) when possible and desirable, the designation of its
sponsorship or service area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
601.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
